website_summaries.verdict: The Canon Selphy CP760 takes the pain out of printing photos with its plug-and-play design and straightforward usability, and the $100 price tag makes it an excellent companion printer for quick prints in the home.
cons: Large footprint (including paper path) for a "compact" printer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is easy to use and prints beautiful quality photos, and that is why after years of use I ordered another when it no longer worked. I received someone’s return that was damaged. I returned it and ordered another one and AGAIN received a returned defective printer. Beware of this older model printer, order the new version.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.

customer_reviews.title: A great little printer
customer_reviews.text: The Canon Selphy 760 is a great little printer. It's compact, simple to use, inexpensive, and the photos are brilliant. The cartridges don't dry out like they do on an ink jet printer. If you want something dedicated to just 4x6 photos at a reasonable price, I recommend getting the 760 model. The newer models cost more and don't have any advantage over this one. All they've added is a ridiculous bucket and bright colors on the printer. I like the all white one better, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Agate

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have only printed 5 pictures so far with the cp760, but so far I am pretty satisfied. It was easy to set up and the picture quality is pretty good in my opinion. It would be nice to be able to zoom in on a picture and then print, but I can do that with my other ink jet printer and it really isn't a big deal. As far as "exact 4x6 size paper", who cares! I will just use the pics for scrapbooking and will be cutting them up anyway. I already framed one of the pics and it fit perfectly. I only paid $75 for it and it was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: we use it to print pictures of pets at our dog grooming shop. it does a great job. we attach our camera directly to the printer and the rest is easy. i try to clean out the area where the ink cartridge goes often due to hair getting inside. you can even get print paper with a post card back. i would buy another and will someday.
customer_reviews.author: TomWV

customer_reviews.title: I like it!1
customer_reviews.text: it's very much like my Kodak that gave out..perfect for what I use it for ..that is mostly pictures I take to use for my paintings and photos for my friends..
customer_reviews.author: Vikibydesign

customer_reviews.title: nice little printer!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something compact that I could take with me on vacations, etc. and this is perfect! My five year nephew can even hook it up to the camera and pick which picture he wants to print. The quality for each print is fantastic. It does not print bigger than 4x6. I thought the ink/photo paper combo that goes with this was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: T Catherine

customer_reviews.title: The little printer that could
customer_reviews.text: This is great little printer, that produces very clear and vivid permanent pictures very easily that even kids can use it. The unit can read SD and other memory cards directly and is real easy to produce fantastic color prints. The 4 and not 5 stars is because it uses Canon paper only as opposed to off the market paper - at least so far. Overall a good buy that will fill you with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzroy Harewood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact printer. Great pics fun to print all my pics. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The printer came from an outside supplier and was exactly as described in the sales material. It was in excellent shape and in the original box. Put it to use immediately without any problems and saved at least 50% over the cost of a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Philip G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Small Printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer!!! Once you figure out how the ink works, it is very cool! Definately has great photo quality, and I love the fact that I can see the photo before I print it. I don't have a computer at home, so it is nice that you don't plug this printer into a computer to use it! Also, it is very small!
customer_reviews.author: sarahleep

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased w/this item that I ordered another one. The only negative is that even though I bought the 2nd one the following week it was sold for $20.00 less and Amazon did not offer a price adjustment. I was very disapointed b/c other merchants that I have purchased from offer an adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: SOTSUBS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed! That is the only word to describe how I feel about this printer. It is so simple to use. Right out of the box, I just followed the instructions, printed directly from my camera and presto! A perfect picture! This is the best $50.00 I have ever spent here at Amazon... Fred
customer_reviews.author: Frederick W. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom as a companion gift to a camera my sibs and I got her for Mother's Day -- and it is EXCELLENT, even for the technically challenged. Easy to use, no computer hook-up required. The photos might not pass muster with aficionados, but for the casual photographer -- especially one who takes photos at parties and wants to share them with friends -- it's ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Lorcasaur

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good little color printer. Much better price here on Amazon than Best Buy. Color quality is much better than ink jet due to dye sublimination process. Size is small, weight is light. Very easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Shastastan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my sister
customer_reviews.text: I never heard her complain about it so she must have liked it. Not sure what else to put here to help you with your buying decision. Sorry...
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: Best ever!! Love the fact that you can print the pictures you want at your convenience. Easy to use, described as is and would def buy again if needed :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer for the money
customer_reviews.text: I would gladly purchase again, we purchased for our charity group to take pictures of children in their Halloween costumes so they could decorate the pictures as a memento of the event. so needed an on site printer (actually two) to do the job. Worked great, it could be a little faster but for the money I think it was just right.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great Dye Sublimation Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: Was researching dye sublimation printers for our company. Wanted a quality product with cost effective supplies. This Canon printer is compact, delivers photo shop quality 4 x 6 photos (believe this is the only size it will print), and is very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vernacchio

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Printer Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small printer that works really well at printing off memory cards without being attached to a computer. It is easy to use and the quality of the photos is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I really like this printer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this printer - it replaces my old Kodak Easy Share which stopped working totally. So far so good - print quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Paula L. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product and it works great! Saves so much time going and getting prints! Awesome Buy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to self-developing photographs
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. An economical, practical alternative to in-store or online photo developing.
customer_reviews.author: RQBII

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first printer of this type and I was really impressed by the picture quality. Also, the cost of the cartridges/paper pack seems reasonable as well. Being able to print directly from the memory card or camera is really convienent.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Schlesinger

customer_reviews.title: Needed a printer, bought a printer...
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for regualr style pictures. I am not a techie, so this is just from my perspective. Great little gadget for my picture printing needs.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: canon selphy 760
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied with this Canon Selphy 760 printer at all. I printed one box of paper (100 pictures) in maybe 2 years; because I use printer occasionally and suddenly it stopped working giving the message - "change cartridge' though it was a brand new cartridge. It was not possible to take it out. I tried to repair it but without any success. Everything is packed on the way that no repair is possible. When it was working everything was ok, but it stopped after 100 pictures. What to say? It is too expensive printer for so short `life time'. The price should not be more than $50-60. Printer finished in garbage.
customer_reviews.author: vojin

customer_reviews.title: happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this purchase! Was exactly as described and works amazing. So great to have! And a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: JGeorge

customer_reviews.title: The little printer that thinks it could.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are excellent. Wish it could do 5X7's, but for the cheap price and size of the printer for convenient storage its just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod76

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My first unit malfunctioned so this is a replacement and I find it very handy
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Canon Selph
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer for a charity event. We took pictures of entering honorees, printed them and framed them as gifts. The picture was fantastic and the color was perfect. Everyone asked me where I got that great little printer. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Shertenlieb

customer_reviews.title: Canon Selphy, nice pics but slow printing
customer_reviews.text: Produces nice quality photos,but took about 1-2 minutes per photo. which is ok if you're only printing a few here and there. if you want to print alot of pics, do them at cvs. only thing i don't like is that the 2 edges are perforated, have to tear off the extra photo paper edges(needs particular type of photo paper, specific to this printer).
customer_reviews.author: Shmeegles2020

customer_reviews.title: Canon makes good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have had this photo printer for five (5) years and no problems. I only print about ten(10) to fifteen(15) photos per year so really don't have a true cost per print. Saves the hassle of going somewhere to have standard 4x6 prints made. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Canon printer, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to use, so far pics are good quality, good color and definition. Preview screen is small and no off button.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Green-Clancey

customer_reviews.title: A Good Little Printer
customer_reviews.text: We mainly got this little printer because we have lots of pictures online, but very few around our house. This printer works good. It produces very nice 4x6 and smaller images. The 4-to-a-sheet wallet size feature is a favorite of my daughter who trades pictures with her friends. If you don't need anything larger than a 4x6, this is a good printer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lucey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife since she just cant stop taking pictures. Was easy to setup, use and connect to our WiFi system. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: not for me nor my inlaws
customer_reviews.text: paper trays kept getting jammed, and the on screen menu was difficult to navigate. I was looking for something for my in-laws to use since all cameras are going digital. They and I tried for months to get comfortable with it. no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Kmmccon

customer_reviews.title: Outdated
customer_reviews.text: I used the startup ink jet and paper to try the printer and it was workable. Although the photo going in and out of the printer seemed odd and slow. The major issue was when I went to purchase the ink jet cartridge and paper, neither was available at well-known office supply stores. One manager said he stopped carrying them a year ago because of lack of demand. Also the ink jet and paper are sold as one unit so you have to buy only Canon replacements and only together. I returned mine for refund, which I received minus the return shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Clay R. Tist

customer_reviews.title: canon selphy compact photo printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice photo printer. It's great when you just want to pick the best and print. Great color!
customer_reviews.author: Dollie

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new ink cartridge got stuck in the printer the first time we used it. We had to return it and pay $22 extra dollars to send it back and lost our brand new ink cartridge. Bad product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: photo printer
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the speed of delivery on my new photo printer. The printer is a perfect size. The only problem i have with the printer is the ink cartridges . they only print out about 8 photos then run out. I didnt realize that part, I had to order more ink right away cause i print out alot of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: L. Levinson

product_meta.title: Canon SELPHY CP760 Compact Photo Printer (2565B001)
product_meta.description:
Canon SELPHY CP760 Compact Photo Printer - 4"X8"

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The compact Canon SELPHY CP760 Dye-Sublimation Photo Printer prints colorful, accurate photos each and every time and is extremely portable, so it goes where you go. No need for a computer, this photo printer will print directly from a memory card, USB drive, PictBridge-enabled digital camera, or via the optional BU-30 Blue tooth interface (sold separately).

 Canon's advanced dye-sublimation printing process produces outstanding 4 x 6 inch photos in less than a minute and at a crystal clear 300 x 300 dpi resolution. With over 256 levels of colors available, this printer is capable of producing 16.8 million different color combinations. Enhance images using the 2.5 inch TFT display and included software in order to take full advantage of the CP760's photo processing power.

 The Canon CP760 is capable of printing photos as large as 4 x 8 inches that are both water resistant and resist fading for up to 100 years. It also features an extremely compact design measuring 7.9 x 3.3 x 5.6 inches (WxHxD) and weighing just 2.1 pounds. The CP760 is compatible with both Windows and Macintosh, and it's backed by a 1-year limited warranty.

 What's in the Box
SELPHY CP760 Compact Photo Printer, 4 x 6 inch Trial Ink Cassette, 4 x 6 inch Paper Cassette, 4 x 6 inch Trial Standard Paper Pack, Cleaner (Inserted prior to Shipment), Compact Power Adapter, CD Printer Solution Desk, Document Kit: Cross Sell Sheet, Customer Support Leaflet, Registration, Setup Software & user's guide, CD-ROM, User Guide, Warranty Card.
feature_bullets: Prints full-color 4 x 6 inch photos in less than a minute
No need for a computer -- print directly from a memory card or USB drive
Prints colorful photos at resolutions as high as 300 x 300 dpi
Compact design measures 7.9 x 3.3 x 5.6 inches (WxHxD)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars101 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
